dict.string: We require access to your media library so you can share content with your +1s.
We require access to your calendar so that we may add events to your schedule.
We require access to your camera so that you can take photos to share with your +1s.
We require access to your contacts so that we may invite your friends to Positive +1
Face ID can be used to authenticate access to the app

Positive+1 asks for location access to peronalise the user's experience so that users can be recommended events and resources near to them. A user's location is not shared with other app users unless they give permission, and their precise location is never shown.

Positive+1 asks for location access to peronalise the user's experience so that users can be recommended events and resources near to them. A user's location is not shared with other app users unless they give permission, and their precise location is never shown.

Positive+1 asks for location access to peronalise the user's experience so that users can be recommended events and resources near to them. A user's location is not shared with other app users unless they give permission, and their precise location is never shown.
Positive+1 asks for microphone access as users can create video content within the app. Microphone access allows users to capture audio alongside the video.
Please allow access to photo library so you can upload and share your photos with your +1s.
We require access to reminders so that we may remind you of events in your schedule.
Your data will be used to deliver promoted content personalized to you, and help us improve your experience.
